meanings.definition: A laborer working on a building site.
meanings.sent1: The navvy carried heavy bricks at the construction site.
meanings.sent2: The skilled navvy quickly built the foundation of the house.
meanings.sent3: The navvy joked with his coworkers while taking a break from digging.
meanings.sent4: She was a true navvy, laying the groundwork for her future success.
meanings.sent5: The determined navvy never shied away from hard work, always giving his best.

meanings.definition: To work as a laborer on a building site.
meanings.sent1: He decided to navvy for extra cash during the summer.
meanings.sent2: They navvied tirelessly to complete the project on time.
meanings.sent3: She will navvy tomorrow to help finish the construction.
meanings.sent4: Navvying through the day, he felt a sense of accomplishment.
meanings.sent5: Navvying under the scorching sun, they showed great dedication to their job.
